explains: [第三人称单数 overeats 过去式 overate 过去分词 overeaten 现在分词 overeating]

sentences.en: If you tend to overeat because of depression, first take steps to recognize the source of your sadness.
sentences.cn: 如果你因为沮丧而打算暴食的话，首先要设法弄清你悲伤的来源。

sentences.en: They can overeat and gainweight if they want to.
sentences.cn: 如果愿意，他们可以暴饮暴食，增加体重。
